Articles.Content:
I need an addon that would tell me how much memory and cpu cycles are being used by each of my currently installed addons.

So I could quickly identify why I am playing at 1 FPS.

Unfortunately that's not possible. There is a system that might let you identify that but it is very involved and you will need to understand how all your mods work at a code level. Unfortunately KSP ships with debugging disabled so access to those metrics is difficult and predicated on a higher than typical level of understanding how C#.net works.

It's effectively cheating.

There is however a mod that will show you the totals in game; it's separating the impact of different mods that can't be done easily.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92907-GCMonitor-1-1-A-Mono-graphic-memory-monitor-for-devs

Edited October 12, 2014 by Greys
